about_the_game:
Are you ready for the grand opening of Happy Furry Restaurant?
Meet the adorable residents of the forest and run the restaurant until the day you become the legendary Chef King!

Cook and Serve Food

Take orders from customers and serve them delicious meals. Your fluffy employees and feathered, sleek, or even chitinous cooking tools are ready for your command. Don’t forget to offer warm encouragement—with the help of your brand-new whipping machine!

Gather Ingredients

A meat-loving customer placed an order, but you’re running low on ingredients? Open your hand wide and embrace the abundance of the forest.

Keep Your Restaurant Clean

Leaving your restaurant untidy can lead to serious issues: poor hygiene, tripping employees, or awkward stares from litter. Clean up in time!

Deal with Complaints

Is a customer upset because their food arrived late? A complimentary bottle of premium champagne might just calm them down—for good.

Defend Your Restaurant

With popularity comes jealousy and unwanted attention. Whether you choose to appease or fend off these threats is up to you… although not for long.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 1703 (Creators Update)
  • Processor: Dual-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Run your restaurant in the forest full of adorable denizens, and bountiful resources. Cook, serve, and pacify customers. Hire, command, encourage employees. Wipe out trash from your restaurant to keep it clean. Until the day you become chef king.
